verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%>, Go your <S%G5217>ways<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> pour <S%G1632>out<s%> the <S%G5357>vials<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G565>went<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>vial<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>fell<s%> a <S%G2556>noisome<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4190>grievous<s%> <S%G1668>sore<s%> <S%G1519>upon<s%> the <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> upon them which <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>vial<s%> <S%G1519>upon<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of a <S%G3498>dead<s%> man: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>vial<s%> <S%G1519>upon<s%> the <S%G4215>rivers<s%> <S%G2532%G1519>and<s%> <S%G4077>fountains<s%> of <S%G5204>waters<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G5204>waters<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%>, Thou <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%>, O <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5607%G3801>art<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2258%G3801>wast<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shalt <S%G3741%G3801>be<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> thou hast <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G5023>thus<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> they have <S%G1632>shed<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> thou hast <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%>, Even <S%G3483>so<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3841>Almighty<s%>, <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> are <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2920>judgments<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>vial<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> power was <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G2739>scorch<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> were <S%G2739>scorched<s%> with <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2738>heat<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G5025>these<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3991>fifth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>vial<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2362>seat<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> full of <S%G4656>darkness<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3145>gnawed<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1100>tongues<s%> <S%G1537>for<s%> <S%G4192>pain<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> because <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4192>pains<s%> <S%G2532%G1537>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1668>sores<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>vial<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4215>river<s%> <S%G2166>Euphrates<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> was dried <S%G3583>up<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G935>kings<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G395%G2246>east<s%> might be <S%G2090>prepared<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G944>frogs<s%> come out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G1404>dragon<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the false <S%G5578>prophet<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> of <S%G1142>devils<s%>, <S%G4160>working<s%> <S%G4592>miracles<s%>, which go <S%G1607%G3739%G1607>forth<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3625>world<s%>, to <S%G4863>gather<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4171>battle<s%> of <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3841>Almighty<s%>.

<S%G2400>Behold<s%>, I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2812>thief<s%>. <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%G1127>watcheth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5083>keepeth<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%>, <S%G3363>lest<s%> he <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1131>naked<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G808>shame<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> in the Hebrew <S%G1447>tongue<s%> <S%G717>Armageddon<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>vial<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G109>air<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1831>came<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, It is <S%G1096>done<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1027>thunders<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G796>lightnings<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake<s%>, such <S%G3634>as<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3739%G575>since<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, so <S%G5082>mighty<s%> an <S%G4578>earthquake<s%>, and <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G1096>divided<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3313>parts<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> of the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%> came in <S%G3415>remembrance<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, to <S%G1325>give<s%> unto <S%G846>her<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%> of the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of the <S%G2372>fierceness<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3520>island<s%> fled <S%G5343>away<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3735>mountains<s%> <S%G2147>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G2597>fell<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5464>hail<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, every stone <S%G5613>about<s%> the weight of a <S%G5006>talent<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> because <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4127>plague<s%> of the <S%G5464>hail<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G4127>plague<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G4970>exceeding<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%>.
